help_entry.name: AutocorrelatedRelaxedMolecularClock
help_entry.succinct: Implementation of an autocorrelated relaxed molecular clock model
help_entry.verbose: This function describes an autocorrelated relaxed molecular clock model as implemented in Kishino et al., 2001, Thorne et al., 1998. The rates are autocorrelated from parent to child and are drawn from a distribution.

argument.arg_description: An autocorrelated relaxed molecular clock model

help_entry.author: Wai Lok Sibon Li
